pkgmetadata.longdescription: Yozai Font (悠哉字体) is an open-source Chinese font derived from Y.OzFont. This is a casual, friendly Chinese font suitable for informal contexts and creative designs. The font includes three weights: Light, Regular, and Medium, providing flexibility for various design needs.
悠哉字体是一款衍生于 Y.OzFont 的开源中文字体。这是一款休闲、 友好的中文字体，适合非正式场合和创意设计。字体包含三个字重： Light（细体）、Regular（常规体）和 Medium（中等体），为各种 设计需求提供灵活性。
